ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard? [How many days have you p layed!?]
ygData.msgSnippet: Tani wrote: So in addition to days played, I think we should also include how much money EQ has saved us over the last two years :) Perhaps we should also
ygData.messageBody:
Tani wrote:
So in addition to days played, I think we should also include how much
money
EQ has saved us over the last two years :)

Perhaps we should also include how many arguements with loved ones you've
avoided by being far too distracted twisting melodies to even notice
someone was nagging you.

Or, for those like me who tie up the only phone line in the house, how many
telemarketing phone calls have you missed?

Why EQ is a blessing from above, I tell you!

:-)

Evulia, bard of 14.2 levels, Tunare
